name: Reckless Conversion
effect: Put the top two cards of your deck into your memory then banish four cards at random from your memory. Class BonusReturn all cards from your memory to your hand. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw:
Put the top two cards of your deck into your memory then banish four cards at random from your memory.
[Class Bonus] Return all cards from your memory to your hand. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
